original_title: 夫の上司に犯●れ続けて7日目、私は理性を失った…。 武藤あやか
overview: When my husband was suffering from mental health problems due to his boss's power harassment and excessive overtime, Director Oki helped me to move to another department. I had the impression that he was kind and dependable, but that was a big mistake... One day, Mr. Oki visited my house and attacked me in revenge for his divorce. There is no way I can talk to my husband whose emotional wounds have not healed yet. The days of Ryou continue with no choice but to accept, and on the 7th day...
title: On the Seventh Day of Being Ravished by My Husband’s Boss, I Lost All Sense of Reason… Ayaka Muto
